findings.description: deno cache command used non-standard flags and suppressed errors with || true.

findings.description: Standalone server re-implements logic and lacks rate limiting found in Edge Functions, despite database infrastructure being present.
findings.fix_suggestion: Consider refactoring server/main.ts to use the database adapters for rate limiting and usage stats, matching the Edge Function behavior.

summary: The CI/CD and Docker implementation is generally very high quality, following best practices for Deno and React containerization. Key missing documentation has been added, and the Dockerfile has been hardened with necessary libraries and cleaner cache commands.
